LanguageData.Ocean.label: ocean
LanguageData.Ocean.description: Open ocean. Great for fish - not so great for you.
LanguageData.IceSheet.label: ice sheet
LanguageData.IceSheet.description: The surface is covered with sheets of ice which can be kilometers thick. There is no access to soil or rock, so there are no plants. The only animals seen here are migrating to somewhere else - or badly lost.
